Headline: Green Line Trains bypassing Cicero/Lake Station
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cicero/Lake due to flooding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Cicero/Lake due to flooding.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service from Pulaski/Lake to Laramie/Lake, in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #54 Cicero buses.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
